meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a wife.
meanings.sent1: She showed her uxorial love by cooking his favorite meal.
meanings.sent2: The uxorial duties included taking care of the household.
meanings.sent3: The uxorial bond between them was evident in their shared laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her uxorial devotion was a beacon of light in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The uxorial care she provided was like a warm embrace.

meanings.sent1: Their uxorial vows were heartfelt and sincere.
meanings.sent2: The uxorial ceremony was a beautiful celebration of love.
meanings.sent3: The uxorial agreement brought them closer together.
meanings.sent4: Their uxorial unity was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The uxorial commitment they made was unbreakable.
